function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Loneliness due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased mental health issues such as depression and anxiety, and overall mortality risk","Mitigation":"Provision of virtual social interaction platforms, mental health support services, and community outreach programs","Technologies":"Virtual communication tools, telemedicine platforms, and community engagement apps","People":"Quarantined and isolated individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and community support groups"},{"Description":"Increased prevalence of mental health outcomes during COVID-19","Impact":"Higher rates of depression, stress, and anxiety","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support services, stress management programs, and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, and online therapy platforms","People":"Population affected by COVID-19 and related restrictions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government mental health agencies, and community support networks"}]}
